changeSet.author: iguliam
changeSet.comment: Add agency for Rest Tasks tests
changeSet.sql: delete from ThirdPartyAgent where ThirdParty_ID in (select id from ThirdParty where code in ('TaskRestAgency1','TaskRestAgency2','TaskRestAgency3'));
delete from ThirdPartContact where phoneTypeDescription1='Rest phone type';
delete from ThirdParty where code='Test Agency Rest 1';
delete from ThirdPartyAddress where addressLine1 in ('RESTAutoTest','RESTAutoTestMailing');
delete from BrokerAgencyExtendedInfo where ownerName='RESTAutoTest' and id = '2';
delete from PaymentDetails where statusUpdatedBy = 'RESTAutoTest' and id='2';
insert into PaymentDetails (DTYPE,statusUpdatedBy,id) values ('PaymentDetailsCheque','RESTAutoTest','2');
insert into BrokerAgencyExtendedInfo (ownerName, id) values ('RESTAutoTest','2');
insert into ThirdPartyAddress (addressLine1,city,countryCd,postalCode,stateProvCd,DTYPE,id) values ('RESTAutoTest','Walnut Creek','US','94596','CA','ThirdPartyAddress','8');
insert into ThirdPartyAddress (addressLine1,DTYPE,id) values ('RESTAutoTestMailing','ThirdPartyAddress','9');

insert into ThirdPartContact (id,phoneType1,phoneType2,phoneTypeDescription1,ThirdParty_ID,seqIdx,isPreferred,contactMediaType,contactType) values ('2','1','2', 'Rest phone type', (select id from ThirdParty where code='TaskRestAgency1'), '0','1','defaultContact','defaultContact');

insert into ThirdPartContact (id,phoneType1,phoneType2,phoneTypeDescription1,ThirdParty_ID,seqIdx,isPreferred,contactMediaType,contactType) values ('3','1','2', 'Rest phone type', (select id from ThirdParty where code='TaskRestAgency2'), '0','1','defaultContact','defaultContact');

insert into ThirdPartContact (id,phoneType1,phoneType2,phoneTypeDescription1,ThirdParty_ID,seqIdx,isPreferred,contactMediaType,contactType) values ('4','1','2', 'Rest phone type', (select id from ThirdParty where code='TaskRestAgency3'), '0','1','defaultContact','defaultContact');

changeSet.author: lgu2
changeSet.comment: Add Profile(s) for Notes Rest Test with all privileges except 'Add Note', 'Update Note' and 'Notes Inquiry' privileges

delete.where: role_id = (SELECT id as role_id FROM S_AUTHORITY WHERE name = 'QA RestNotes5')

changeSet.sql: insert into S_ROLE_PRIVILEGES (role_id,priv_id) SELECT (SELECT id as role_id FROM S_AUTHORITY WHERE name = 'QA RestNotes5' and DTYPE='ROLE') as role_id, priv_id FROM S_ROLE_PRIVILEGES where role_id=(SELECT id FROM S_AUTHORITY WHERE name = 'QA All') and priv_id!=(Select id from S_AUTHORITY where name='Add Note' and DTYPE='PRIV') and priv_id!=(Select id from S_AUTHORITY where name='Update Note' and DTYPE='PRIV') and priv_id!=(Select id from S_AUTHORITY where name='Notes Inquiry' and DTYPE='PRIV');

column.name: auth_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM S_AUTHORITY WHERE name = 'QA RestNotes5' and DTYPE='ROLE')

changeSet.author: alebediev

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from S_PRINCIPAL where DTYPE='GROUP' and domain='corporate' and name in ('Policy Sales & Service - Basic (Sales Reps)','Policy Sales & Service - Intermediate (Sales Support)','Policy Sales & Service -Advanced (Underwriting)')

changeSet.comment: REN-22838-1 Assign groups to QA user for smoke tests

column.name: user_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM S_PRINCIPAL WHERE DTYPE = 'USERPROFILE' AND domain='corporate' AND name='qa')

column.name: group_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM S_PRINCIPAL WHERE DTYPE='GROUP' and domain='corporate' and name='Policy Sales & Service - Basic (Sales Reps)')

column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM S_PRINCIPAL WHERE DTYPE = 'USERPROFILE' AND domain='corporate' AND name='qa')

column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM S_PRINCIPAL WHERE DTYPE = 'USERPROFILE' AND domain='corporate' AND name='qa')

column.name: group_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM S_PRINCIPAL WHERE DTYPE='GROUP' and domain='corporate' and name='Policy Sales & Service -Advanced (Underwriting)')
